description:
Auto accidents usually occur without warning and can leave those involved with serious personal injury. At the Richmond, Texas, law firm of Reed & Terry, LLP, we offer dedicated legal services to people in the Richmond area, as well as in Sugar Land and Katy and throughout Fort Bend County. With each case we handle, it is our goal to help our clients achieve financial justice for the losses they have suffered due to the negligence of others.

For more than 20 years, our law firm has assisted people with a range of complex legal issues, guiding them through the system and helping them achieve financial compensation. We have provided representation to clients in matters involving motor vehicle collisions, medical malpractice, defective drugs and medical devices, boating and maritime accidents, and other such incidents.

Our attorneys recognize that the effects serious injuries have on people often extend beyond physical pain and suffering. Uncertainties about how they will afford their medical care and everyday expenses while they are off work recovering may complicate an already challenging time. We work closely with our clients, striving to see them recover maximum compensation for their economic and noneconomic losses.

In addition to helping those involved in motor vehicle collisions and other accidents, our attorneys at the law firm of Reed & Terry, LLP, assist those who have suffered harm due to the negligence of their health care providers. We thoroughly review the circumstances surrounding each client's treatment to identify where lapses in care occurred and help gather the necessary documentation to support their claims. We offer free initial consultations, and we accept credit card payments.
